pages.text: Wraiths are new aggresive creatures that can be found in the Soul Sand Valley.$(br2)They attack like a common Zombie, inflict slowness and jump back upon dealing damage.$(br2)On death, they always drop a $(l:patchouli:tools/quark/soul_bead)Soul Bead$(/l) on death.
They're the lost souls of different creatures, and as such, their sounds are low pitch versions of normal mob sounds.
